entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
